name: Leprachaun Magical Air Armour <grey>
data: It increases the users strength ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users dexterity like a god.
It increases the users constitution like a god.
It has superb armour class for its type (ILLEGAL in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users electric resistance unearthly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
Greatly modifies users resistance to damage.
